mapper.insert: insert into lagarto.supplies (icategory, title, ctnt, iuser, price) values (#{icategory}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser}, #{price})
mapper.select: select A.*, B.nm as writernm From lagarto.supplies A Left join lagarto.lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser where A.isdel = 0 Order by A.iboard DESC LIMIT 1

select A.*, B.nm as writernm, B.nickname as nicknm, C.nm AS categorynm,D.save_name From lagarto.supplies A Left join lagarto.lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN lagarto.supplies_category C ON A.icategory = C.icategory LEFT JOIN (SELECT iboard, MIN(idx) , save_name FROM sup_attach GROUP BY iboard) AS D ON A.iboard = D.iboard where A.isdel = 0 and A.icategory = #{icategory} Order by A.iboard DESC

select A.*, B.nm as writernm, B.nickname as nicknm, C.nm AS categorynm ,D.save_name from lagarto.supplies A LEFT join lagarto.lagarto_user B on A.iuser = B.iuser left JOIN lagarto.supplies_category C ON A.icategory = C.icategory LEFT JOIN (SELECT iboard, MIN(idx) , save_name FROM sup_attach GROUP BY iboard) AS D ON A.iboard = D.iboard where A.isdel = 0 order by A.rdt DESC

SELECT A.*, B.nm as writernm , B.profile_img,B.nickname as nicknm, C.nm as categorynm from lagarto.supplies A inner join lagarto.lagarto_user B on A.iuser = B.iuser inner join lagarto.supplies_category C on A.icategory = C.icategory where A.iboard = #{iboard}
SELECT DISTINCT A.iboard,A.iuser,A.num,B.* FROM cart A INNER JOIN supplies B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iuser= #{iuser} AND A.payment = 0 ORDER BY A.iboard;
SELECT * FROM cart WHERE iuser = #{iuser} AND iboard = #{iboard} AND payment = 0;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE iboard = ${iboard} AND iuser = ${iuser}
